Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX550Ti or better, 1280x720
